name: Traitors
description:
WARNING the version on browser is buggy

A small game made in the BenBonk GameJam , the theme was Trust no one ...

We had 3 days to complete the game. I worked during the gamejam so i  had probably 20-24 hours to do mine. 

The goal is to find the exit to complete 5 Levels. But wait the civilians can turn against you and try to kill you. You can only kill 5 civil before lost the game

I hope you will like the games and i wait for your comments :D

A Executable is available 

Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/user/Skalkevai

Making Of : Coming Soon
